idea:
Redcells Diagnostics Pvt Ltd is leading Indian Diagnostics Company based in Mumbai. We are mainly focused on specialized biochemistry segments including Enzymes, Substrates and Immunoturbidity kits. 

Our main objective is to provide all necessary support to pathology labs for diagnosing patient in right direction with right approach; we believe that patient wellbeing is our utmost aim.

We feel that with the help of our application support which is our greatest strength, we would like to offer right products to achieve superior results which will finally help patient to be diagnosed on right time and to be cured without any delay.
name: REDCELLS DIAGNOSTICS PVT LTD

idea: "At TriStar Motor Garage, we assure you quality professional work at a reasonable price. We are registered under MSME, Govt of India and TriStar Motor Garage was started on 10th Oct, 2021 by a Young Budding Entrepreneur, Age 29 Years. TriStar Motor Garage is run in a professional Manner unlike unorganised way Garages are run in India. We are improving & learning day by day to make it best Garage in Mumbai & Thane. We are also preserving & restoring Classic & Vintage Cars. Imported Cars too is being repaired & serviced at TriStar Motor Garage. Our Professional Services are as below: Premium Detailing & Polishing Foam Car Wash Full Car Service Repair Restoration Mechanical Electrical A/C Service Denting Painting TriStar Motor Garage"
name: TriStar Motor Garage
